import React from 'react' import { ItemCart } from '../../model/ItemCart' import './Checkout.css' interface Props{ itemCarts: ItemCart[] } export default function CheckoutForm(props:Props) { return (

Your info:

Your order

{props.itemCarts.map(item=>{

{item.name}

{item.quantity}

{item.price*item.quantity}

})}
) }
